mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_title, review_content, email, camp_id, review_image, review_point, review_count, review_date) VALUES (#{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{email}, #{campId}, #{reviewImage}, #{reviewPoint}, #{reviewCount}, #{reviewDate})
